Oh noes! i use, well um,

 

 

laser sword

Disco ball.

Then it falls.

14 hours ago, TheKSPBeginner said:

I use @Vanamonde!

Ah, I'm already lost then... Until 19th of this month !

I use according to all known laws if aviation, bees shouldn't be able to fly. Their tiny wings are too small to get their fat little bodies off the ground. The bee, of course, flies anyway, because bees don't care what humans think is impossible. anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-anti-tank shells

Edited March 6, 2018 by TheMadKraken2297
I use Helicopter and @Vanamonde!

I use an invincible energy shield, then delete my forum account.

 

don't worry, not really

Edited March 7, 2018 by HansonKerman
Next poster, I use Reenter the Right Way!
I use Jool! Have a fun time with your Jool landing.

Since KSPBeginner has to survive us now... 

BEGINNER! I use comic sans Ms! (It's not sans on my phone, weird)
I use Reset button! Now I'm in charge!

I use my elven longsword! (Crap, I don't have my character sheet) I think I use a D6 as my hit die... Ok. Hrm... 

Not sure how to roll for damage without a D6 but I'm fairly DnD Unlucky so I'll think I rolled a 2. Who's the dm? I need to know if I hit him. (Someone just roll a D20)

Curse you Halfling Rouge!

Also, last time I checked I had twenty gold pieces and had invested 7 points into stealth. I can hide behind a creature one size larger! (My character is a halfling so that means pretty much everything except demon squirrels) good luck finding where that sword came from.

Edited March 9, 2018 by TheMadKraken2297
GameMaster claims mass dispel.
Well, crap.
I use guns, all of them.
I summon... Comic Sans MS, then disable Reset button! Now you must survive US! #ComicSansMS

Conjuring Comic Avec MS. MS returns back, the comics continue.

antonym to sans, afaik
Reset!
Load backup!
Insufficient disk space.

Edited March 16, 2018 by TheKSPBeginner
Don't actually lock this
Adblock image filter has successfully hidden the lock picture.

Never a problem...

(or rather, it's always a thing it's just normal)
I use Re- Format hard drive! (My HDD has some kind of damage and every 2-3 days I have to reformat it... I need to just buy a new drive)

Reformatting complete.
HDD is compressed from 3.5" down to 2.5".
